entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
